properties.name: Lazy Dog
properties.wheelchair:description: The inside of the pub ground floor is level, but the ladies toilets are up a step. The garden is down some steps from the main bar, but is accessible via a side gate.

properties.name: The Clifton Vaults
properties.note: notices say "Clifton Wine Bar is now The Clifton Vaults" - even if signage says otherwise.

properties.note: the two northerly blocks are called either "Water Shed" or "Watershed" depending where you look; the full name for the arty venue is "Watershed Media Centre"
